mapper.update: UPDATE internal_order_number ion,(SELECT ion.id,SUM(iont.`head_trip_cost_rate`*sku.`weight`*splss.`quantity`) theoretical_amount FROM `internal_order_number` ion,`internal_order_number_transport` iont,`fba_packing_list_shop_sku` splss,`shop_sku` ss,sku WHERE ion.create_time>= #{createTimeStart} and ion.create_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{createTimeEnd}),INTERVAL 1 DAY) and ion.id=iont.internal_order_number_id AND iont.`fba_shipment_id_short`=splss.`fba_shipment_id` AND splss.`shop_sku_id`=ss.`shop_sku_id` AND ss.`sku_id`=sku.`sku_id` GROUP BY ion.`id`) a SET ion.theoretical_amount=a.theoretical_amount,ion.theoretical_amount_status=1 WHERE ion.id=a.id
